In Technimble-2017 Civil Engineering Students actively participated in Project/Model Expo at NSRIT. Students actively Participated in Teachers Day – 2018 Celebrations on 05/Sept/2018 Students actively Participated in Freshers Day – 2018 Celebrations on 08/Sept/2018 Students actively partcipated in Engineers Day – 2018 Celebrations on 15/Sptember/2018 In Technimble-2k19 Civil Engineering Students actively participated in Project/Model Expo, Paper Presentation & Poster Presentation at NSRIT on 21-22 December – 2018. Students actively Participated in Sankranthi Sambaralu Celebrations-2K19 on 11/Jan/2019 13 no.s Civil Engineering Students participated in MEGALITH-2019 at IIT-Kharagpur from 08/03/2019 to 10/03/2019.
